articles.author: Scott Shafer
articles.title: Californians React Biden's Decision To Name Kamala Harris His Running Mate
articles.description: Joe Biden has picked Senator Kamala Harris as his running mate. The pick of a running mate from California is unusual, since candidates usually balance their ticket with someone from a swing state.
